frontMatter.title: Snapdrop
frontMatter.summary: Instantly share images, videos, PDFs, and links with people nearby. Peer2Peer and Open Source. No Setup, No Signup.

next.title: Flowchart Maker & Online Diagram Software
next.summary: draw.io is a free online diagramming application and flowchart maker . You can use it to create UML, entity relationship, org charts, BPMN and BPM, database schema and networks.
